title: Gary Gensler Explains Why SEC Is Taking Litigation-Heavy Strategy to Regulate Crypto
description: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chairman Gary Gensler has explained why the securities regulator is taking a litigation-heavy strategy to regulate the crypto industry. The SEC chair insisted that enforcement actions against crypto firms are not brought with a political agenda, emphasizing that he is protecting the American public. “This is a field where […]

title: Why the Buyback-and-Burn Approach Is Growing Popular For Crypto Ventures
description: For decades, conventional financial markets have embraced the buyback strategy, with corporations buying their shares to reinforce trust and potentially amplify stock value. As we tread into the digital finance era, a refreshed version of this strategy is making waves: the cryptocurrency “buyback-and-burn.” This blend of time-tested financial wisdom and cutting-edge blockchain innovations is rapidly ... title: AI-Powered AR Lens Debuts at Riyadh Book Fair, Boosting Deaf Community Inclusivity
description: In a historic alliance, Snapchat, the global tech giant, has joined forces with the Ministry of Culture in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to launch an extraordinary augmented reality (AR) lens at the Riyadh International Book Fair 2023.
